HERO.TITLE: All your business cycles in one place, even across multiple companies and different operations
HERO.DETAILS: From finance, inventory, sales, and purchasing to HR — discover how Al-Motammem brings all operations together under a single system, whether for one company or multiple companies, with consolidated reporting across companies and other levels.

FINANCE.TITLE: Finance & Accounting
FINANCE.DESC: General ledger, accounts, fixed assets and depreciation, cost centers, financial reports.

INVENTORY.TITLE: Inventory
INVENTORY.DESC: Inventory control, stock valuation, balance tracking, stocktaking, and revaluation of inventory.

PURCHASING.TITLE: Purchasing and Supplier Accounts with payables tracking
PURCHASING.DESC: Full purchasing cycle from purchase requisitions, supplier quotations and evaluation, to purchase orders, receipts, invoices and returns, and purchasing analysis.

SALES.TITLE: Sales and Customer Accounts with receivables tracking
SALES.DESC: Full sales cycle from quotation requests and price offers, to sales orders, invoicing, delivery and returns, statements of account and aging of receivables, and sales analysis.

HR.TITLE: HR & Payroll
HR.DESC: Employee management, payroll, attendance and time tracking, performance, HR records, recruitment, appraisal, and employee self-services.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects & Control
PROJECTS.DESC: Resource planning, project costing, and execution tracking.

REPORTS.TITLE: Reports & Dashboards
REPORTS.DESC: Real-time insights, performance indicators, and custom analytics.

SECTION3.TITLE: Al Motammem serves most business sectors
SECTION3.DESC: Regardless of your company’s field, Al Motammem provides integrated functionalities that help you manage your business more efficiently, serving industries ranging from manufacturing and commercial companies to service sectors, distribution, export and import, non-profit organizations, and multinational corporations.

COMMERCIAL.TITLE: Commercial Sector
COMMERCIAL.DESC: Accurate management of financial data with advanced reports and analytics, timely generation of all financial reports, and automated alerts triggered upon or prior to predefined financial events.

MANUFACTURING.TITLE: Manufacturing
MANUFACTURING.DESC: Track items and their movements, including raw materials, semi-finished goods and finished products, with full costing for each item. All movements are linked to sales, purchases and both production and service cost centers, with alerts when predefined thresholds or conditions are reached or about to be reached.

CONTRACTING.TITLE: Contracting
CONTRACTING.DESC: Monitor supplier and subcontractor accounts, and calculate the costs and revenues of each project and every work item in real time, fully linked to trial balances, income statements and balance sheets.

NON_PROFIT.TITLE: Non-profit Organizations
NON_PROFIT.DESC: Track funding sources and related spending, link them to the planned budget, and receive alerts when predefined limits or conditions are about to be or have been exceeded.

IMPORT_EXPORT.TITLE: Import & Export
IMPORT_EXPORT.DESC: Follow up import operations and calculate the exact cost of each shipment and every item within it, linking this to inventory and accounts until the item reaches the warehouse, enabling accurate real-time cost of sales and profitability calculations.

DISTRIBUTION.TITLE: Distribution
DISTRIBUTION.DESC: Monitor the sales plan at company, region and sales-rep levels and beyond, follow up sales representatives and their commissions, and generate detailed analytics on sales and profitability by rep, region, governorate, city, route and item, and many other analysis dimensions.

MULTINATIONAL.TITLE: Multinational Companies
MULTINATIONAL.DESC: Accurate management of financial data with advanced reports and analytics, and the ability to generate all financial reports in real time in operating currencies, local currency and the parent company’s currency.

FOOD_BEVERAGE.TITLE: Food & Beverage
FOOD_BEVERAGE.DESC: Accurately track items and their expiry dates, and monitor production batches for each item, whether on purchase, sale or remaining stock.

SERVICES.TITLE: Services
SERVICES.DESC: Manage contracts, monitor team performance and issue invoices with ease and accuracy.

TRADING_PROJECTS.TITLE: Trading, Import/Export & Projects
TRADING_PROJECTS.DESC: Plan resources, control costs and schedule tasks for each project, with direct linkage to financial and operational results.

FINANCE_ACCOUNTING.TITLE: Finance & Accounting
FINANCE_ACCOUNTING.DESC: Accurate management of financial data with advanced reports and analytics, real-time financial reporting, and alerts when predefined thresholds or conditions are about to be or have been reached.

privacy.intro: Microtech is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Please read the following statement to understand how your personal information will be treated as you make full use of Microtech's website

voluntary.title: Voluntary Submission
voluntary.body: Microtech does not collect personally identifying information about any individual Microtech website user except when knowingly provided by such individual. For example, we may ask you for information when you register for a contest or survey or to receive a newsletter. You always have the option not to provide the information we request. If you choose not to provide the information we request, you can still visit most of the Microtech website, but you may be unable to access certain options and services.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.body: A cookie is a data file that certain websites write to your computer's hard drive when you visit such sites. A cookie file can contain information, such as a user identification code, that the site uses to track the pages you have visited. Microtech uses cookies solely to track user traffic patterns throughout the Microtech website. We use this data on an anonymous basis and we do not correlate this information with personal data of any user. Most website browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually change your browser settings to display a warning before accepting a cookie, or to refuse all cookies. However, if you choose to disable the receipt of cookies from our website, you may not be able to use certain features of the site.

browser.title: Browser Level Information
browser.body: Microtech web servers automatically collect information about a site user's IP address, browser type and referrer by reading this information from the user's browser (information provided by every user's browser). This information is collected in a database and used in an aggregated, anonymous manner in our internal analysis of traffic patterns within our website. This information is automatically logged by most websites.

use.title: Use of Information
use.p1: Our primary goal in collecting user information is to enhance your experience on our website. We achieve this goal by, among other things, providing interactive communications such as our electronic newsletters to the e-mail address that you provide to us, and developing future editorial content based on your interests. To develop content targeted to your interests, we use aggregated user information to determine which areas of our website users prefer based upon traffic to those areas. We do not track what individual users read, but instead how well each page or content area performs overall.
use.p2: Microtech could derive some benefits and/or revenue from advertising. In order to attract and retain advertisers we use the aggregated, anonymous information that we gather (as well as information from third-party market researchers) to describe our services to partners and to assist our advertisers and sponsors to better understand our audience. We do not disclose personally identifying information about our users to these parties.
use.p3: Microtech may also disclose information about our users when we believe, in good faith, that the disclosure is required by law.
use.p4: When you are on an area of Microtech website and are asked for personal information, you are sharing that information with Microtech as well as business partners and vendors providing hosting and other services for Microtech. If you do not want your information to be shared, you can choose not to allow the transfer of your information by not using that particular service. These parties, as well as advertisers who contract directly with a third-party service to serve their advertisements, may set their own cookies.
use.p5: In addition, any personally identifiable information provided by our users as part of an advertiser promotion online may be provided directly to advertisers.
use.p6: Please be aware that Microtech sponsors, advertisers or websites that have links on our site may collect personally identifiable information about you. The information practices of those parties and websites linked to Microtech are not covered by this privacy statement. Microtech users should also be aware that, when you voluntarily disclose personal information in chat areas or bulletin boards, that information may be collected by others and may result in unsolicited messages from others.
use.children: Children under 13: Do not send any information about yourself to us including information such as your name, address, or e-mail address. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. In the event that we learn we have collected any personal information from a child under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information from our database as quickly as possible.
